name: Wairua Garden
description:
Created by Eli and Tyson Kingi during the Regenerate Game Jam 2022.

A 2D metroidvania platformer inspired by Journey and Celeste.

Join Wiremu on his journey to enrich the wairua of his wharenui's garden.

Play in FULLSCREEN for best experience

Controls:
WASD - movement
Space - Jump

WARNING: This game may potentially trigger seizures for people with photosensitive epilepsy. Viewer discretion is advised

Music from https://www.fesliyanstudios.com
